channel.title: Ding on ossem: a creative space
channel.description: Recent content in Ding on ossem: a creative space

item.title: Ding
item.description: Saturday night. Waiting. For her. Passive reproach. Someone’s watching. Stirring the sword. The air is sweet. Watching the beat of that drum. Doing nothing. Just being around. Doing. Nothing. N1o2 t3h4h5i6n7g.8.9.0. Something Curious strikes a chord. That sounds mighty fine. Let’s examine that closer. Nocturnal nectar. Many rooms. Many locks. It’s interesting up here. Scary. Right now. Not then. Now. Sweet sweet sw33t. What are you doing? Finding did you do something you seem interesting.
